properties.areaDesc: Waters from Freeport to Matagorda Ship Channel TX from 20 to 60 NM; Waters from High Island to Freeport TX from 20 to 60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 8 at 9:49PM CST until January 9 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Houston/Galveston TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southeast winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and
seas 5 to 7 feet expected.

* WHERE...Waters from Freeport to Matagorda Ship Channel TX from
20 to 60 NM and Waters from High Island to Freeport TX from 20
to 60 NM.

* WHEN...Until 6 PM CST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THURSDAY
